desc: 전투 시작 후 3턴 간 방어력을 ７5% 증가

dictionary.lore: Though taunted as being a coward, it was Prime Minister Darvahnshel with his shield that saved the king from an assassination attempt. In praising his loyalty and wisdom, the King of the Sama Kingdom bestowed him with a new shield, upon which he requested that Darvahnshel give it a name. Appreciative of not just how sturdy it looked but also how beautiful it was, without hesitation he gave it the name of his wife.

name: 영지의 방패「엑세일」
